aboutParagraphs: A Fullstack Developer with experience working with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.  I have a passion for learning and exploring new technologies, and Iâ€™m always looking for the most efficient way to solve problems and deliver excellent results. During my time working in development, I've worked on a variety of projects, including developing websites and both client-side and server-side software.
Beyond my work, I love spending time in nature and working out at the gym. I believe that a combination of creativity, hard work, and persistence is the key to success.
If you're looking for a developer who works in an organized, professional manner and always seeks creative solutions, do not hesitate to send me a message!

p: If you want to chat, ask something, or share an idea â€” Iâ€™m here.
Feel free to reach out via the form below or email,

eventsSite.title: Events site
eventsSite.desc1: A full-stack event management website, using React, Node.js, and MongoDB as my final project at HackerU College.
eventsSite.desc2: The application includes user and event management with a calendar feature integrated via a React library, allowing business users to create events and regular users to view and like them.
eventsSite.desc3: This project demonstrates end-to-end development with a focus on interactive scheduling and role-based functionality.

cardsSite.title: Business Cards site
cardsSite.desc1: A responsive business card website using React, part of my studies at HackerU. This project includes features for creating, editing, and organizing business cards, focusing on a smooth and user-friendly interface.
cardsSite.desc2: Note: The API used in this project is no longer active, so the live site is currently unavailable.

crudApi.title: CRUD API
crudApi.desc: A server-side application with Node.js and MongoDB for user and card management, allowing secure CRUD operations and user authentication. This project emphasizes efficient backend structure and data handling.
